nodes.text: The Jedi Praxeum of Dathomir was established by Jedi Masters Streen and Kirana Ti after the end of the Yuuzhan Vong War to help in the recovery efforts there after the Yuuzhan Vong's conquest and subjugation of the planet and to train the locals to become Jedi Knights.

Due to Darth Caedus holding the Ossus Jedi Academy hostage during the Second Galactic Civil War, the staff and students of the Jedi Praxeum of Dathomir were evacuated by the Jedi Order to a base on Endor, and later Shedu Maad. As of 43 ABY, the Dathomiri Praxeum remained abandoned.
